Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/54th
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/54th.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Fullerton
ShortDescription: Southbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand, then resume over their normal route on Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand, then resume over their normal route on Austin.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to construction near Austin/Fullerton.
